Name: Amidst the Stars
Description: Keeping its promise, KU-Cass reveals a piece of crucial intel: an omnipotent Resonator once existed in the Black Shores. The clues leading to their legacy are now scattered throughout the Black Shores...
QuestDesc: Keeping its promise, KU-Cass reveals a piece of crucial intel: an omnipotent Resonator once existed in the Black Shores. The clues leading to their legacy are now scattered throughout the Black Shores...

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Cass
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ku ku ku! You're finally here!

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Cass
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As my business partner, what I'm about to share with you is information no money can buy!

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Cass
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, it'd be much appreciated if you happen to have the latest game cartridges to share with me in return, of course...

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Cass
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A long, long time ago...

Options.PlotLineKey: What's storytelling got to do with this?

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Cass
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's part of the intel! I'm getting there!

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Cass
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A long, long time ago, there was a mysterious figure in the Black Shores! Legends say {Male=he;Female=she} wields power beyond imagination. With a simple wave of the hand and a snap of the finger, a Threnodian could be destroyed in the blink of an eye!

Options.PlotLineKey: Sounds like using cheats in a video game.

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Cass
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: However! One day, {Male=he;Female=she} disappeared without a trace, and was never seen since.

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Cass
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Not even a single record about {Male=him;Female=her} can be found in the Tethys System.

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Cass
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Some say in the deepest corners of the Black Shores, {Male=his;Female=her} frequencies still linger, part of which {Male=he;Female=she} willingly abandoned, while part of which {Male=he;Female=she} unintentionally left behind.

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Cass
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What do you think? Sounds like there's buried treasure to be found, doesn't it?

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Cass
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let's hop to it, then! I heard the first spot is close to the TD Observatory's anchor, somewhere with a bird's-eye view of the Greenhouse.

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Cass
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If you manage to find the treasure, I'll... Well... It's all yours!

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Cass
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But in exchange, I'd like you to take a photo of its exact location for me as a souvenir. Deal?

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Cass
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll follow up with more intel as you go, same as before!

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Cass
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hello, hello! Look's like you've found the first clue. Not bad.

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Cass
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Do take a look at the other two locations I've sent you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A strange yet assertive frequency wells up in you.
From simplicity to complexity.
We must unite the people, and rally under one banner.
This island, this planet, will one day bloom endlessly like summer blossoms.
